author: 3xmd1559sporebraytondingo
content:
Would it make sense (e.g. for purposes of preserving the original status quo of miner agency) to double the 1/1024 value to 1/512, on the basis that miners influence gas limits rather than gas targets now, and the limit-target ratio is 2.

An ~ 0.1% change to the gas limit will only change the target by ~0.05%, right? This would likely still be within the realm of safety in case of DoS attacks.

author: timbeiko
content: No strong objection I can think of, though in practice it probably doesn’t change things a ton either way (though we could lower the limit quicker in case of an attack) and propbably isn’t a high enough priority change compared to everything proposed for Shanghai so far. That said, perhaps it’s easy to add to <@415548822983278593>’s time-based base fee update EIP !
